org.pac4j.play

Class PlayWebContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.context.BaseResponseContext
      • org.pac4j.play.PlayWebContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.pac4j.core.context.WebContext

    public class PlayWebContext
extends org.pac4j.core.context.BaseResponseContext

    This class is the web context for Play (used both for Java and Scala).

    "Session objects" are managed by the defined DataStore.

    "Request attributes" are saved/restored to/from the context.

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
